1.content:
First choose your Gender. You can be one of the following two Characters below.


First Choice:

Alex. 19 year old white male. 5'10ft 175lbs. Dirty blonde hair with blue eyes.

Second Choice:

Kelly: 17 year old latina girl. 5'3ft 105lbs. Shoulder length dark brown hair with brown eyes.
1.title: Gender

choices: Leave the bathroom and seek help
Just stay in the bathroom and wait
11.content: A new family amusement fun center has just opened up in your town about a week ago. From what people have told you they have really good pizza and lots of cool things to do there. Its the weekend now and you and your friends have decided to try something different and end up going to eat at the new pizza joint. The food is really good like everyone told you and they have lots of neat stuff to do such as an arcade, golfing, go karting just to name a few. After playing a few games with your friends you realize that you need to use the restroom real fast. You walk in to the mens bathroom and go about your business. While washing your hands at the sink you start to feel a little sick. Everything around you starts to spin as you get dizzy. You're all alone in the bathroom to make things worse. You then end up falling down and hitting your head on the tiled floor, passing out......When you wake up you notice you're still in the bathroom. Only everything around you is 100 times bigger. You then come to realize the horrible fact that you've been shrunk! You have to do something now before something even worser happens!
11.title: The new restaurant

111.content: You exit the bathroom in desperate need to get help from someone. As you leave the restroom you can now see tons of giant people walking around everywhere. Its like some very messed up dream! You decide its probably wise to not stray off too far and go looking for your friends as it is now pretty easy for you to become smashed underneath somebodys shoe! Looking around your vast surroundings, you spot a couple of young girls close by to you that could maybe be of good help. The first one is a teenage girl around your age. She has long blonde hair and blue eyes. Shes wearing a black jacket over a white shirt with baggy blue pants and black tennis shoes. The second one is a much younger looking asian girl, around 10 or 11. Black hair and brown eyes. Wearing a blue dress and white tennis shoes with no socks. Both of them seem to be waiting in line to play an arcade game. Making up your decision quickly you run over to..
111.title: Looking for help

1111.content:
The blonde just ordered herself a peice of pizza. In fact it is the same sort of pizza you were just having... You dont know what caused you to shrink but suddenly it occurs to you that it may have been something you ate.
You run towards her screaming just as she lifts the peice of pizza towards her mouth about to bite into it. She stops for a moment...
1111.title: Something didnt agree?

1112.content: You run over to the gigantic young asian girls shoe then jump up and grab onto her shoelace just as she walks away. You pull yourself up then hang on as tightly as possible while she begins walking around looking for another game to play. After a short little wild ride, the girl decided that she wanted to play..
1112.title: Big white shoe

choices: Leave the bathroom and seek help
Stay in the bathroom and wait
12.content: A new family amusement fun center has just opened up in your town about a week ago. From what people have told you they have really good pizza and lots of cool things to do there. Its the weekend now and you and your friends have decided to try something different and end up going to eat at the new pizza joint. The food is really good like everyone told you and they have lots of neat stuff to do such as an arcade, golfing, go karting just to name a few. After playing a few games with your friends you realize that you need to use the restroom real fast. You walk in to the womens bathroom and go about your business. While washing your hands at the sink you start to feel a little sick. Everything around you starts to spin as you get dizzy. You're all alone in the bathroom to make things worse. You then end up falling down and hitting your head on the tiled floor, passing out......When you wake up you notice you're still in the bathroom. Only everything around you is 100 times bigger. You then come to realize the horrible fact that you've been shrunk! You have to do something now before something even worser happens!
12.title: The new restaurant 2

choices: Try and hitch a ride on her shoe
122.content:
The floor beneath your feet shakes as the giantess enters the restroom. You see it is a chunky latino girl in her early 20's wearing a black "raiders" pull over sweatshirt, blue jeans and black low cut converse chuck taylor sneakers. Her hair is black and in a ponytail. She actually has a really pretty face. She is just overweight but that doesnt deter from the fact she is attractive!

"Wait......why am I thinking like that? Im a girl for crying out loud!" You say to yourself! The young woman goes to blow her nose and wash her hands. It appears she had a bit of a bloody nose. Probably due to the humidity in this restaurant but she seems to have taken care of the problem. You took this chance to start screaming and yelling at the top of your lungs hoping the young woman will notice. Sadly at 1 centimeter tall it will not be easy getting somebodys attention!

Just then the young woman crumbles up her paper towel and tosses it in the trash. She then turns around and starts to stomp right torwards you as she makes for the exit! You realize you better do something quick and,
122.title: Enter the giantess

info.brief_description: You go to eat at a new restaurant then end up shrinking
info.description: You can choose to be either a Male or Female in this story. Basically you go to eat at a new pizza place that just opened up with some of your friends then end up shrinking to a Centimeter tall! Will you be able to survive and return to normal size before its too late? Feel free to contribute whatever you want but try to keep the story relatively clean!
